dataPointDefinitions.name: Deye Inverter Modbus Mode
dataPointDefinitions.description: Displays the current Modbus communication mode configured for the Deye inverter. The value is an integer code representing a specific mode.
dataPointDefinitions.notes: The OPC UA server reported "Bad_AttributeIdInvalid" for the Description attribute of this node. This means the server does not provide a textual description for this specific node path, but its Value (0 in example) should be readable. The value likely represents an enumeration code for different Modbus modes; check Deye documentation for code meanings.
